sentences.en: I bought two bowls of glutinous millet paste at the temple fair.

sentences.en: Millet is cultivated in the middle or lower reaches of the Yellow River.
sentences.cn: 在黄河中下游地区,人们种植谷子.

sentences.en: She steeped the tonic in the yellow millet wine.

sentences.en: The food was very simple - teachers ate millet gruel three times a day.
sentences.cn: 吃的食物非常简单,老师一天三顿喝小米稀粥.

sentences.en: The high quality millet flour was obtained through wet milling.
sentences.cn: 采用湿磨法获得了高品质的小米粉.

sentences.en: The maize and millet were just putting forth ears.
